snippet: John F. Tierney, a representative for the North Shore of Boston and a nine-term Democrat, knows about tough races against Republicans, but he faces a strong primary challenge from an Iraq War veteran.
abstract: Profile of Rep John F Tierney of Massachusetts, nine-term Democrat from the North Shore of Boston who is facing a strong primary battle; while Tierney has faced tough fights against Republicans before, he now must overcome challenge from fellow Democrat Seth Moulton, a well-financed, Harvard-educated Marine veteran who served four tours in Iraq.

byline.original: By KATHARINE Q. SEELYE and JESS BIDGOOD

lead_paragraph: John F. Tierney, a representative for the North Shore of Boston and a nine-term Democrat, knows about tough races against Republicans, but he faces a strong primary challenge from an Iraq War veteran.

headline.seo: Rep. John F. Tierney Braces for Another Fight for His Political Life
headline.main: Veteran Democrat Faces Hurdles to Re-election
headline.print_headline: Veteran Democrat Faces Hurdles to Re-election
